creditline: Gift from the estate of Mary C. Muessig
description: cut sheet silver pin in shape of a sheep; body is cut in cloud shape; 11 crescent shaped stamps on body to give appearance of wool; four legs jot down from bottom of body; head of sheep has to poked eyes and two horns on top of head; clasp pin is soldered on back of body
markings: stamped on back (on pin body): R. LEE Sterling
title: Pin
